question: I am 35 with Type 1 diabetes since last 9 years. I do have Moderate ED problem and using Viagra. Now my semen discharge is reduced to 2-3 drops. I consulted the specilist and my TSH is normal. Free androgen index showed testerones level to 39 which is quite normal. Can u tell me the reason for semen volume reduction. Is  it due to diabetes or some other reason and how can i improve it. Detailed answer sahll be appreciated. regards.
title: Low semen production
